description: Households containing two children <= 5 observed for at least 365 days, one who had 0 malaria diagnoses and another who had at least 1 malaria diagnosis / yr during observation.

For calendar years 2012-2013, find all Children aged 2-10 who were observed at least 365 days and live in households where <= 5 mosquitoes were collected on average in 2012-13 and had at least 2 malaria=yes visits / year. Of those, how many had at least one asymptomatic visit in that time frame.

For calendar years 2012-2013, find all Children aged 2-10 who were observed at least 180 days in that time period and live in households where >= 10 mosquitoes were collected on average in 2012-13 but who had 0 malaria=yes visits / year. Of those, how many had at least one asymptomatic visit in that time frame.
